dc:title: The Deportation of Francisco Fernandez
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Describes the deportation to Spain of Francisco Fernandez from a Federal prison. Lauds his dedication to human freedom, protest against the state, and decries all totalitarian regimes.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 918 1955-04-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
